caption.title: Calibration of the anti-HBV titer assay.
caption.p: The spotted HBsAg (ad) protein microarray was calibrated with an anti-HBs antibody standard obtained from NIBSC. The calibration equation is: MFI = 204.76 + 3.108 * (anti-HBs titer). Weighted linear least squares regression was used for data fitting (see Materials and Methods part).
Click here for additional data file.
